title: World's First Cloud Gaming Laptop! Instant gaming!
description: Ive partnered with @Lenovo to show off the new Lenovo Ideapad Cloud Gaming Chromebook! Click the link to learn more:  #LenovoCloudGamingChromebook #LenovoCloudGaming #ad @google  Combined T&Cs for Cloud Gaming Retail Bundle  Offer includes 3-month trials to NVIDIA GeForce NOWs highest membership tier ($59.97 value), and Amazon Luna+ ($29.97 value) at no cost with purchase of -list eligible Blazey devices sold at retailer- at -name of retailer + country-     The GeForce NOW offer is open to participants who have purchased and activated an eligible Chromebook between September 27, 2022 and August 27, 2023, or while supplies last. The Amazon Luna offer is open to participants who have purchased and activated an eligible Chromebook between September 27, 2022 and March 31, 2023, or while supplies last. To activate the offers, open the Explore app on your eligible Chromebook, navigate to the Perks tab to locate the offers, then click Get Perk and follow the instructions to redeem. Limit 1 redemption per offer per eligible Chromebook device. Promotional trials may be canceled at any time before the trial period is over. Additional terms apply.*     *Additional offer specific terms:     GeForce NOW: NVIDIA GeForce NOW terms of use membership terms and privacy policy apply.     Amazon Luna+: Offer available to customers who have not subscribed to, or started a trial of, Luna+ in the previous 12 months. Valid form of payment required at signup, but will not be charged until after the 3 month promotional trial unless you cancel. After the 3-month promotional trial, your subscription will automatically continue at the current monthly price of $9.99 plus applicable taxes until you cancel. Offer cannot be combined with any other offer. Luna+ is subject to the Amazon Luna Terms of Use. Offer limited to one per Luna customer and account. Amazon reserves the right to modify or cancel the offer at any time. Offer is non-transferrable and may not be resold. If you violate any of these terms, the offer will be invalid.      PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE -   FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:       WHAT I USE TO MAKE VIDEOS    CAMERAS: Sony a7 IV -  Sony a1 -   Sony a7s III -   Insta 360 ONE X3 -  Insta 360 ONE RS -  Insta 360 GO2 -   LENSES: New Sony GM 24-70mm ii -  Older Sony GM 24-70mm -  New Sony Sony 20-70mm -  Sony GM 16-35mm -  Sony GM 50mm -  Sony GM 135mm -  Sony GM 85mm -   AUDIO:  Sennheiser AVX Digital Wireless -  Sony XLR Adapter -  Sony Hot Shoe Shotgun -  Tiny Sony Microphone -  DJI Mics -  Rode Podcaster Pro II -  Podcaster Mic -  Elgato Wave 3 Mic -   DRONES: DJI Mavic 3 -  DJI Mini 3 -  DJI Air 2S -   LIGHTING: Aputure 600d Pro -  Aputure Light Dome II -  Aputure Amaran 200d -  Aputure 35in Light Dome -  Aputure Lantern Softbox -   Sony CF Express A 160g + Card Reader-  Sony CF Express A 800g -     These links are affiliate and by using them youre helping out my channel! Thank you!     BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:
transcript: - Hey guys, it's Justine, and today we are checking out the Lenovo Ideapad Gaming Chromebook. Now, I would say most of the time when you think about a Chromebook, your first thought might not be for gaming, but this changes all of that. This is the world's first laptop built for cloud gaming. Thanks to Lenovo for sponsoring a portion of this video. I recently have been back to traveling and having the ability to take gaming on the go with a light and portable device is really appealing. This features 120 Hertz QHD display for high-end graphics. There's no installs needed, and you'll instantly have access to thousands of games. It's also really nice because you get automatic updates from the cloud, so you won't have to worry about your device ever being out of date. This keyboard is a multi-zone RGB gaming keyboard, which is very nice for typing when or if you decide to take a gaming break and do some work. This laptop was built to play, and I can definitely relate with that because I have been playing video games for pretty much as long as I can remember.
